15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa'eed bin Zaid:that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Whoever revives a barren land then it is for him, and there is no right for the unjust root

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا ذُكِرَ فِي إِحْيَاءِ أَرْضِ الْمَوَاتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Mentioned About Reviving Barren Land
